```{r, include = FALSE}
install.packages(c("dplyr", "ggplot2"))
install.packages("readr")
library(knitr)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
Sampledata2 <- read_csv("Sampledata2.csv")
glimpse(Sampledata2)
head <- head(Sampledata2, 10)
summary <- Sampledata2 %>% group_by(Year) %>% summarise(Mean_CrimeRate = mean(CrimeRate), Max_CrimeRate = max(CrimeRate), Min_CrimeRate = min(CrimeRate))
histogram <- ggplot(Sampledata2, aes(x = CrimeRate, fill = as.factor(Year))) + geom_histogram(position = "dodge", bins = 30, alpha = 0.7) + labs(title = "Histogram of Crime Rate by Year", x = "Crime Rate", y = "Frequency", fill = "Year") + theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "right")
scatter <- ggplot(summary, aes(x = Year, y = Mean_CrimeRate)) + geom_point() + geom_line(aes(group = 1, y = Mean_CrimeRate), color = "blue") + labs(title = "Scatter Plot of Crime Rate over Years with Average", x = "Year", y = "Crime Rate") + theme_minimal()

```
